title: Oscars 2017: Casey Affleck, Emma Stone or Dev Patel – who will bag the Academy Award statuette this year?
text:
Samir Kocchar with the cast of The Amazing Spiderman 2 - View pics! 
In a few hours we will know who is going to steal the crowning glory at the biggest and the most honourable award ceremony on Earth. One thing we can be sure of – this year’s Oscars belongs to one and only La La Land. The musical romantic drama is most likely to get away with most of the awards, especially some of the major ones here. But apart from La La Land, most of the other movies nominated for the major categories are something we call as Oscar bait – moving human dramas with some heartfelt performances and heart-wrenching moments that you can only watch once. 
While some of the best entertaining movies have been ignored by the jury this year, most hurtful snubs being Deadpool, 20th Century Woman, Sully, Captain America: Civil War. However, there is no point in crying over spilled milk, so instead let’s look at who is going to win among the chosen ones. In India all eyes will be on what dress Priyanka Chopra will be wearing and how much will she be giggling throughout, plus there is the India-origin actor Dev Patel who is nominated as the Best Supporting Actor for his performance in Lion (though there is very little chance that he would be getting an award. 
Well, here are our predictions for who will win the Oscars in all major categories…. 
Best Picture 
Who will win : La La Land 
Best Director 
Who will win : Damien Chazelle (La La Land) 
Best Actor 
Who will win : Casey Affleck (Manchester By The Sea) 
Best Actress 
Who will win : Emma Stone (La La Land) 
Best Supporting Actor 
Who will win : Mahershala Ali (Moonlight) 
Best Supporting Actress 
Who will win : Viola Davis (Fences) 
Best Animated Feature
